question: 根据音标 /ɪə/ 在括号内填入所缺字母： t(   ) b(   )(用逗号分隔）
用所给单词的适当形式填空：It's 11 o'clock. The students (   ) (have) an English lesson.
选择最佳答案前面的字母：Look! There's a big fire! Here (   ) many firemen. A. comes; B.coming; C:come
Whose old benches are those? （改为单数句）
根据情景选择句子，完成对话, 用前面的首字母填空：
A. It's a beautiful sunny day. B. The black shape follows me everywhere.
C. Look, the sun is high in the sky. D. The sun rises in the morning.
E. The sun goes down in the evening. F, It's your shadow.
Alice has no schools today. She's sleeping in bed now.
Mum: Alice, get up. It's too late. (   )
Alice: OK, Mum. (   ) Can we go to the park?
Mum: That's a good idea. Come on, Alice. Alice and her mum are in the park now.
Alice: Look, Mum. (   ) Sometimes it stays behind me. Sometimes it walks in front of me. It's fun
Mum: (   ) Your shadow is short. It's at noon.
Alice: I'm thirsty. Can I have some water?
Mum: Yes, of course you can. Let's have a picnic. (   ) Alice and her mum go home together.
